bug.author: S10MC2015
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
spleeter not importing <denchmark-h:h2>Step to reproduce</denchmark-h>
I have not a clue.
Installed using git clone then initialize venv Run as ?. ran using "cmd /k "E:\Anaconda\Scripts\activate.bat && cd /d E:"audio source seperation"\spleeter && python -m venv spleeterenv source spleeterenv/bin/acticate && cd /d E:"audio source seperation"\spleeter && python.exe spleeter separate -i "C:\Users\User\Downloads\NA.mp3" -p spleeter:2stems -o E:\audio source seperation\spleeter\seperated\2stemstest -c mp3 Got relative import with no known parent package error
<denchmark-h:h2>Output</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30575036/79345633-45396f00-7f29-11ea-8d3b-4d21c337470c.png></denchmark-link>
I expect it to just work. <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
OS Windows
Installation type other
RAM available 8gb
Hardware spec CPU amd a10 8700p (ik it is underpowered
------------------- ------------------------------------------------
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>
I am trying to get this to run from python. is there a better way to do it instead of calling a command prompt? Also, the reason I am not using the conda-forge version is that it gets stuck on solving dependencies.

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30575036/79347962-3d2efe80-7f2c-11ea-8c4c-8bc3b3e83391.png></denchmark-link>
now the error has gotten better...

HI <denchmark-link:https://github.com/S10MC2015>@S10MC2015</denchmark-link>
Can you just do the pip install spleeter instead of cloning ?
